ModMetaData.name: RimTrust
ModMetaData.author: user19990313(3 more hidden)
ModMetaData.description:
RimTrust: A legacy mod to enchance endgame and become a true superpower with abundant riches!
Original code from RimBank by user19990313 and 1.1 version of Bar0th included. See workshop page for documentation:
Warning: -use at own risk (should be save file compatible; see original info by user19990313) -not tested with larger modpacks -not tested with any races mods
This is an updated fork of RimBank (Continued) with additional content. I claim no ownership of the original mod. This mod may be taken down by request from the original author. I can implement bug fixes if there are any issues with other mods.
